concept.title: Product development
concept.shortdesc: You have bought a TMS and what comes next? Since every IT tool is upgraded from time to time and you get the new version instantly if you use the cloud-based software, you need to be ready for constant changes.

conbody.p: However, you can also have an impact on the future development plan of a TMS to improve your translation process and achieve your business goals. How is it possible? Your TMS provider can offer a variety of ways to involve you in shaping of the development of its features. Here are a few opportunities:

section.title: XTM Wish List
section.p: With XTM Wish List available from XTM On Demand, you can request or vote for new features. This portal is a platform for customers to submit feedback and suggest what should appear in the TMS. As a result, you can play an active part in creating future versions of the XTM product portfolio.

section.title: XTM Labs
section.p: XTM Labs is a brand new concept leveraging on XTM Wish List. When new features and upgrades that you suggested are included in the next release, you’ll get exclusive access to them. You’ll also be able to submit feedback before they are available to everyone else, and customize them.

section.title: Product Manager
section.p: The position of a Product Manager is a role key to meeting the unique requirements of clients by driving continual improvement to TMS's product strategy. This person works with development teams, as well as with users and customers to collect and analyze their feedback, which is later transformed into a product roadmap.
As a result, it is good to have direct contact to such person at the TMS providers' to be able to voice your requirements and hear about planned releases.
